interpretation: The "telephone" card represents communication and connection. It indicates a need to reach out to someone, whether it be for business or personal reasons. This card can also suggest the importance of clear and effective communication in all areas of life. It may be time to have an important conversation or make a long-awaited phone call. The "telephone" card can also symbolize the power of technology and the ability to connect with people across great distances. Be mindful of how you use this power and make sure to maintain meaningful relationships beyond just digital communication.
